item.title: BottleRock Napa Valley: Food + Wine Line-Up
item.description:
BottleRock Napa Valley: Food + Wine Line-Up

PINNING OUR HOPES: There are always a few wishes in our hearts before we make for a major, multi-day music festival. We hope that we can find lodging nearby, and it won't be too spendy. We hope that our favorite band, the one we're really looking forward to seeing, plays the group's best deep cut.

item.title: Premiere Napa Valley Barrel Auction Raises $5 Million Total | Wine Enthusiast Magazine
item.description:
Premiere Napa Valley Barrel Auction Raises $5 Million Total | Wine Enthusiast Magazine

Premiere Napa Valley-the annual barrel tasting and auction held Saturday, February 20-drew crowds to the Culinary Institute of America at Greystone in St. Helena, California, to sample barrel lots of one-time-only wines, most of which were 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon. A total of $5 million was raised at the event-the third-highest amount in its 20-year history.

item.title: Peter Mondavi, Napa Valley wine pioneer, dies.
item.description:
Peter Mondavi, Napa Valley wine pioneer, dies.

Peter Mondavi, a pioneer of the Napa Valley wine industry, died over the weekend in California. He was 101. Mondavi and his more famous brother, Robert, joined their parents' business, the Charles Krug Winery, in 1943. Back then, the Napa Valley was better known for producing prunes and its grapes were grown for cheap jug wine.

item.title: Premier Cru: Trustee asks judge to order wine company's secret computer turned over
item.description:
Premier Cru: Trustee asks judge to order wine company's secret computer turned over

Posted: 01/28/2016 11:48:18 AM PST Updated: 01/29/2016 09:51:37 AM PST BERKELEY -- A federal judge overseeing the bankruptcy of high-end wine purveyor Premier Cru ordered owner John Fox on Thursday to immediately turn over a secret computer that operated outside the business' accounting system.

item.title: Dickey's Pairs Texas-Style Barbecue With California's Sonoma Wine Country
item.description:
Dickey's Pairs Texas-Style Barbecue With California's Sonoma Wine Country

The largest barbecue chain in the nation opens new location in Petaluma on Thursday Petaluma, CA ( RestaurantNews.com) Dickey's Barbecue Pit opens Thursday with a four-day barbecue bash. The grand opening celebration begins with Thirsty Thursday, when all guests will receive a free drink in a Big Yellow Cup with Dickey's new travel lid.

item.title: Huge wine retailer Total Wine & More to open its first Bay Area store
item.description:
Huge wine retailer Total Wine & More to open its first Bay Area store

Posted: 02/05/2016 12:00:03 PM PST Updated: 02/05/2016 04:09:33 PM PST Even as Bay Area imbibers continue their love affair with boutique brewers, mom-and-pop vintners and small distillers like St. George Spirits in Alameda, which makes apple brandy from a single family orchard, one of the biggest bottle-sellers in America is storming into town next week, plopping a humongous retail outlet in the middle of Fremont.

item.title: Michter's 10 Year Rye Whiskey, 2016 Style, Ready For Release - The Whiskey Wash
item.description:
Michter's 10 Year Rye Whiskey, 2016 Style, Ready For Release - The Whiskey Wash

So here's the deal - Michter's, a "Heritage Member" of the Kentucky Distillers Association, has in its whiskey stable what it calls "highly acclaimed, limited production whiskeys that have been subject to allocation because demand has exceeded supply."

item.title: Ideas to create engaging online content
item.description:
Ideas to create engaging online content

February 18, 2016 | eCommerce , Marketing | Lona Rudd Social media marketing may once have reigned, but it seems creating engaging content is the method of choice for advertisers these days. According a poll by Smart Insights, 29 percent of those surveyed said content marketing was the most important online business trend of 2015.
